room_title: Escape room "Team Building Opportunities" by The Escape Game Dallas in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: We did this as a team building event for our medical sales group and we really had a great time! It was so fun to work together to figure out all the clues and work our way out against time. Definitely looking forward to doing it again. Staff were great too

room_title: Escape room "Team Building Opportunities" by The Escape Game Dallas in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: It was a fun team building experience that really brought everyone together to figure out all the puzzles. I would 100% recommend this for any business or group of friend or family that wants to have fun working together solving problems.

room_title: Escape room "Team Building Opportunities" by The Escape Game Dallas in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: Definitely would recommend this escape room facility to anyone looking for a challenge. Would be a great activity for company employees for team building.

room_title: Escape room "Team Building Opportunities" by The Escape Game Dallas in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: My group did this as team building just a couple of hours after meeting at a seminar. We had a great time and we made it out with 2 minutes to spare.

room_title: Escape room "Team Building Opportunities" by The Escape Game Dallas in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: It was an excellent team building exercise for our staff. We really enjoyed the plot and the layout. We finished with a little more than a minute left on the clock. Was enjoyed by all!
